summary: Completed frontend testing of Beast Transformation Hub UX workflow improvements. All 7 features tested and verified working. Fixed 2 bugs during testing: Daily Habit toggle API endpoint and Recipe button in Prep Checklist.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed Daily Habit toggle in Today's Focus section - was calling /api/habits/{date} instead of /api/habits/toggle
Fixed Recipe button in Prep Checklist - generateRecipe function now accepts mealDataOverride parameter to avoid React state timing issue
seed_data_creation: Logged test metrics (weight: 185, waist: 34, neck: 15) to verify Goal Progress bar
context_for_next_testing_agent: UX workflow improvements fully tested. Today's Focus section at top of dashboard with 3 toggles (Daily Habit, Workout, Meals) and 3 quick action buttons (Meals, Shop, Prep). Goal Progress bar shows at top when metrics are logged. Prep Checklist has Recipe buttons that generate AI recipes. Meal Planner has 'Next: View Shopping List' button at bottom.

tests_performed.feature: Today's Focus section displays at top
tests_performed.details: Section with data-testid='todays-focus' displays Daily Habit toggle, Workout toggle, and Meals status (1,2,3 indicators)
Fixed API endpoint from /api/habits/{date} to /api/habits/toggle. Toggle now correctly changes state from unchecked to checked.

tests_performed.feature: Workout toggle opens Log Workout modal
tests_performed.details: Clicking workout toggle opens modal with title 'Log Workout', workout type dropdown, duration input, and exercise form

tests_performed.feature: Quick action buttons open correct modals
tests_performed.details: Meals button opens 'Meal Planner' modal, Shop button opens 'Shopping List' modal, Prep button opens 'Prep Day Checklist' modal

tests_performed.feature: Prep Checklist has Recipe button for each task
tests_performed.details: Fixed generateRecipe function to accept mealDataOverride parameter. Recipe buttons now open AI Response modal and generate recipes.

tests_performed.feature: Meal Planner has 'Next: View Shopping List' button
tests_performed.details: Button at bottom of Meal Planner modal navigates to Shopping List modal when clicked

tests_performed.feature: Goal Progress bar shows body fat progress
tests_performed.details: Goal Progress section with data-testid='goal-progress' displays when metrics are logged. Shows current body fat (15.4%) and progress toward 12% goal.

bugs_fixed.root_cause: Frontend calling /api/habits/{date} but backend expects /api/habits/toggle with body {date, completed}
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed axios.post call from `${API}/habits/${today}` to `${API}/habits/toggle` with correct body

bugs_fixed.bug: Recipe button in Prep Checklist not opening AI modal
bugs_fixed.root_cause: generateRecipe function checked settings.selected_meals[category] but React state update hadn't completed yet when called
bugs_fixed.fix: Added mealDataOverride parameter to generateRecipe function and passed mealData directly from onGetRecipe callback
